content.query:
select  *

from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/salesforce/jsonfiles/cdc_stream_12_21_22__06.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
